General.Name: Shanghai Electric Power Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shanghai Electric Power Co., Ltd. engages in the power generation of integrated clean and smart energy technology in China and internationally. It engages in photovoltaic, wind, gas-fired power, and thermal power generation; trading of electricity; research and development; technology development; and investment management activities. The company also provides electrical power consulting and power technical services. As of December 31, 2022, it had an installed capacity of 8.1921 million kilowatts. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Meixing  Xia
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
